product_description: Fleece lining adds cozy comfort to a sporty low-top sneaker embellished with flashy side zippers.
product_details_and_care:
Fleece lining adds cozy comfort to a sporty low-top sneaker embellished with flashy side zippers. The chic style is an updated version of the brand's popular Philosophy style.
Lace-up style
Synthetic upper, lining and sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
